sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [name, setName] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [park, setPark] = useState("Select an option") const [age, setAge] = useState("") const [phonenumber, setPhonenumber] = useState("") const [gender, setGender] = useState("male") const [like, setLike] = useState("Select an option") const [username, setUsername] = useState("") const [nameError, setnameError] = useState("") const [emailError, setemailError] = useState("") const [ageError, setAgeError] = useState("") const [phoneNumberError, setphoneNumberError] = useState("") const [genderError, setgenderError] = useState("") const [likeError,setlikeError] = useState("") const [parkError, setparkError] = useState("") const [emptyError,setEmptyerror] = useState("") const resetErrorDefault =()=>{ setnameError("") setAgeError("") setphoneNumberError("") setlikeError("") setemailError("") setparkError("") setgenderError("") setEmptyerror("") } const validate =()=>{ if( name === "" || email === "" || park === "" || age==="" || like=== "" || phonenumber==="" || gender === "" ){ setEmptyerror("All fields are mondatory") setUsername("") return false } if(!name.match(/^[A-Za-z0-9- ]+$/)){ setnameError("Name is not Alphanumertic") setUsername("") return false } if (!email.includes("@")){ setemailError("Email must contain @") setUsername("") return false; } if(!park.match(/web|hulu|youtube|tv|other/i)){ setparkError("Please select an option") setUsername("") return false } if(!gender.match(/male|female|other/i)){ setgenderError("Please identify as male,female or other") setUsername("") return false } if(!phonenumber.match(/^[0-9]+$/)){ setphoneNumberError("Phone number must contain only numbers") setUsername("") return false; } if(!age.match(/^[0-9]+$/)){ setAgeError("Age must contain only numbers") setUsername("") return false; } if(!like.match(/love|like|its ok|not really/i)){ setlikeError("Please select an option") setUsername("") return false } } const handleSubmit =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() resetErrorDefault() const isValid = validate() if (isValid){ setName("") setEmail("") setPark("") setLike("") setAge("") setGender("") resetErrorDefault() } setUsername(email.substr(0,email.indexOf("@"))) } return (

WELLCOME TO SOUTH PARK!

FILL THIS FORM FOR REGISTRATION

{setName(e.target.value)}} />
{nameError}
{setEmail(e.target.value)}}/>
{emailError}
{setPhonenumber(e.target.value)}}/>
{phoneNumberError}
{setAge(e.target.value)}}/>
{ageError}
{genderError}
{parkError}
{likeError}
{/*
{setLike(e.target.value)}} > I love it!

I like it

It's ok

Not really

<>{likeError} */}
Alone

Friends

Family

Partner

Other



{emptyError}

your username

{username ? " " + username : ""}

); } export default App;
